abstract.text: Create cross-platform desktop apps for macOS, Linux and Windows.

inlineContent.text: SwiftCrossUI implements a simple API similar but not identical to SwiftUI, allowing you to use the basic concepts of SwiftUI to create a cross-platofrm desktop app. SwiftCrossUI runs on SwiftGTK, a Swift wrapper for GTK+.

abstract.text: Create cross-platform desktop apps for macOS, Linux and Windows.
